description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. On A Roll is a platform game in which you control a multi-coloured spotted ball with eyes (don't ask) that has to travel across 16 levels of increasing difficulty over four unique graphical themes. Collect the protective stars and power-ups as you go - you'll need them if you're to contend with pits of spikes, enemy striped balls, four end-of-theme bosses, and lots more nasties!
